title: Add text formatting controls in admin panel for homepage sections

requirements.text: Create a new 'Text Formatting' section in the admin panel as a separate tab alongside existing sections (Content, Hero Theme, Clinics, Services, Reviews, Social Media, Footer)

quotes: Create a saparate section for text formarting in admin panel

acceptanceCriteria: A new tab labeled 'Text Formatting' appears in the AdminPanel component
The tab is accessible alongside other existing admin tabs
Clicking the tab displays the text formatting controls

requirements.text: Add backend storage for text formatting settings that stores font size and letter formatting (font family, font weight, letter spacing, text transform) separately for headings and body text across homepage sections: hero, overview/about, services, and footer

quotes: adjust font size and letter formatting of every text on the homepage
category wise adjustment possible like hero section, about, services, footer

acceptanceCriteria: Backend type defines text formatting settings with separate configurations for headings and body text
Settings are organized by section: hero, overview/about, services, footer
Each section stores font size, font family, font weight, letter spacing, and text transform
Query and mutation methods exist to retrieve and update text formatting settings

requirements.text: Create TextFormattingManager admin component with section-based controls allowing independent adjustment of font size, font family, font weight, letter spacing, and text transform for both headings and body text in each homepage section (hero, overview/about, services, footer)

quotes: adjust font size and letter formatting
It will apply to all headings and body saparately and category wise adjustment possible

acceptanceCriteria: Component displays separate subsections for hero, overview/about, services, and footer
Each subsection has separate controls for 'Headings' and 'Body Text'
Controls include inputs for font size (px), font family dropdown, font weight dropdown, letter spacing (em), and text transform options
Changes can be previewed and saved per section
A save button persists all formatting changes to the backend

requirements.text: Apply stored text formatting settings to Hero component's text elements, using heading settings for headline and body settings for subtext, without affecting blog pages

quotes: every text on the homepage not blog page

acceptanceCriteria: Hero headline applies heading formatting from hero section settings
Hero subtext applies body formatting from hero section settings
Formatting updates dynamically when settings change
Blog pages remain unaffected

requirements.text: Apply stored text formatting settings to Overview/About components' text elements, using heading settings for section titles and body settings for description text, without affecting blog pages

quotes: every text on the homepage not blog page

acceptanceCriteria: Overview and About section headings apply heading formatting from overview/about section settings
Overview and About body text applies body formatting from overview/about section settings
Formatting updates dynamically when settings change
Blog pages remain unaffected

requirements.text: Apply stored text formatting settings to Services component's text elements, using heading settings for service titles and body settings for service descriptions, without affecting blog pages

quotes: every text on the homepage not blog page

acceptanceCriteria: Service card titles apply heading formatting from services section settings
Service card descriptions apply body formatting from services section settings
Formatting updates dynamically when settings change
Blog pages remain unaffected

requirements.text: Apply stored text formatting settings to Footer component's text elements, using heading settings for section titles and body settings for footer content text, without affecting blog pages

quotes: every text on the homepage not blog page

acceptanceCriteria: Footer section headings apply heading formatting from footer section settings
Footer body text (contact info, links, copyright) applies body formatting from footer section settings
Formatting updates dynamically when settings change
Blog pages remain unaffected

constraints: Text formatting changes must not affect blog page content
Formatting settings must be stored in the backend for persistence across sessions
Each homepage section (hero, overview/about, services, footer) must have independent formatting controls
Headings and body text within each section must have separate formatting options
nonGoals: Individual element-level formatting (formatting applies to all headings or all body text within a section)
Advanced typography features like line height, text decoration, or text shadow
